snippet: Chicago police said on Monday they are investigating an incident caught on video during a weekend protest that appears to show a  Chicago police car blasting the song "Sweet Home Alabama."...

headline.print_headline: Chicago Police Investigate Video of Cop Car Playing 'Alabama' Song
headline.main: Chicago Police Investigate Video of Cop Car Playing 'Alabama' Song

lead_paragraph: Chicago police said on Monday they are investigating an incident caught on video during a weekend protest that appears to show a  Chicago police car blasting the song "Sweet Home Alabama."
